parameters.name: AdminList
parameters.description: The list of administrators after your change.

parameters.name: DataCenter
parameters.description: The data center. It must be the same as the data center that was specified when you called the [CreateLiveMessageApp](~~2848162~~) operation to create the interactive messaging application. Valid values: cn-shanghai and ap-southeast-1 (Singapore).

parameters.name: GroupInfo
parameters.description: The additional information about the group after the modification. The value can be up to 32 KB in length.

parameters.name: ModifyAdmin
parameters.description: Specifies whether to change the group administrators.

parameters.name: ModifyInfo
parameters.description: Specifies whether to modify the additional information about the group.
